name: European Shooting Sport Council
membership: ESSC participates in the European Shooting Sport Forum (ESSF), a platform uniting European federations and associations representing the shooting sport community, industry and trade
goal:
The principal purpose of ESSC is to represent protect and promote the interests of the shooting sport and athletes in the European institutions.

Among its objectives there are:
• exchange and promotion of information on sport shooting and hunting with public powers in the European Institutions and in various countries of Europe
• offer of information and solutions to European decision-makers on problems of common interest for sport shooters and hunters
• cooperation with other associations, organizations and bodies that share the objectives and ideas of the ESSC.
euInitiatives:
Evaluation of the Firearms directive
The European Agenda on Security
Public consultations on the Firearms directive
Public consultations on environment
